weka.clusterers

Class LFCluster.GridInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.AbstractInstance
      • weka.core.DenseInstance
        • weka.clusterers.LFCluster.GridInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.Copyable, weka.core.Instance, weka.core.RevisionHandler
    Enclosing class:
    LFCluster

    protected class LFCluster.GridInstance
extends weka.core.DenseInstance
    Placeholder for a Instance object that can be managed on the grid.

    GridInstances are agents for the weka.core.Instance objects, as the usual Instance objects are hard to manage on a grid. Therefore each GridInstance represents exactly one Instance in Instances. GridInstances can be placed on the grid, picked up and dropped by ants and tell their represented Instance on demand. So by moving GridInstances on the grid, Instance objects are moved on the grid indirectly.

    Internally only the referenced index of an Instance is stored. Each GridInstance object relies on the global LFCluster.data variable, holding the Instances. A GridInstance can only be interpreted with respect of the data variable. So when the data variable changes, the indexes of the GridInstances are not valid anymore.

    See Also:
    Instance, Instances, Serialized Form
